http_digest_check ( $  users,
$  realm = '' 
)

check if the user is http digest authenticated

Parameters:
array$usersarray of possible users (usernames as keys, password as values)
string$realmrealm (e.g. name of the site)
Return values:
0authenticated
-1user did not request authentication
-2parts of the response are missing
-3unknown username
-4invalid password

$  header_only = false 
)

return a http error message to the client

if $header_only is false (the default), the function doesn't return if successful.

Parameters:
int$codeerror code
bool$header_onlyonly output the header and return
Returns:
bool true if successful (only if $header_only is true), false if not
